# .github Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific configurations for the Netmon project.

## Files

- `workflows/` - GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows
- `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` - Issue templates for bug reports and feature requests
- `pull_request_template.md` - PR template
- `FUNDING.yml` - Sponsorship information

## Community Standards

We follow best practices for open source projects:

- ✅ Code of Conduct
- ✅ Contributing Guidelines
- ✅ Issue Templates
- ✅ PR Templates
- ✅ License (MIT)
- ✅ Security Policy
- ✅ Roadmap
- ✅ CI/CD Pipeline
